name: Add Google Sheets rows for new chats in Typebot
description:
Every time a chat ends in your Typebot survey bot, Make will add the answers to your Google Sheets spreadsheet.
Note that your webhook should have no question index. You should trigger the Watch new chat module before running the scenario for the mappable parameters to load. Here's the [spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nrbOBHBbD_2OCpPvaxYqgfXppK3-wuarfyL5z6rAwmw/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
